questions.title: Financial Concerns
options: I'm facing budget constraints.
The subscription cost is outside my budget.
I found comparable value in a less expensive tool.
I've transitioned to a free alternative.

questions.title: Content Creation Issues
options: The AI-generated content didn't resonate with my preferred voice.
I had difficulty tailoring content ideas to my specific niche.
The AI-generated scripts lacked the depth or specificity I needed.
The AI-powered avatars didn't align with my desired image.

questions.title: Usability & Technical Challenges
options: The user interface wasn't intuitive for my content creation process.
I encountered navigation challenges in the tool.
I had difficulties with the direct posting feature on social media platforms.
The video rendering times were longer than I expected.
The scheduling feature does not fit my expectations or is difficult to use.

questions.title: Functionality & Feature Mismatch
options: I was expecting different features based on what was advertised.
The scheduling feature didn't integrate well with my existing tools.
The credit system was unclear or didn't suit my usage patterns.
The avatar feature is different from what I was expecting or hoping for.

questions.title: Personal & External Reasons
options: I had to cancel due to unforeseen personal reasons.
My business strategy has shifted, and the tool no longer aligns.
I prefer not to specify a particular reason.
I was just testing the application and its features. I did not intend to subscribe.
